## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                   | Type                                     | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Optional color of the element.                                | `"gray" \| "green" \| "red" \| "yellow"` | `"gray"` |
| `radius` | `radius`  | Set the value of the element border-radius. Default is 4(px). | `"0" \| "4" \| "8" \| "pill"`            | `"4"`    |
